name: Inferiority Complex
text: Give to Nebula player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust your alter-ego → remove Inferiority Complex from the game. • Choose and discard 2 [[Technique]] upgrades you control. If no upgrade was discarded this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

name: Gamora
text: Forced Interrupt: When this minion would enter play, discard the Gamora ally from play. [star] Forced Response: After Gamora attacks and damages you, choose and discard an upgrade you control. (Nebula's nemesis minion.)

flavor: "We both did what we had to in order to survive. Why won't you let it go?" - Gamora
name: Self-Preservation
text:
Nebula gets -1 THW, -1 ATK, and -1 DEF.
Gamora gets +1 ATK and her attacks gain piercing.

flavor: "There's only one 'Most Dangerous Woman in the Galaxy', and that's me!" - Gamora
name: Lethal Weapon
text: Attach to Gamora. If you cannot, attach to the villain. Hero Action: Discard an upgrade you control → discard this attachment.

name: Old Rivals
text: When Revealed: Gamora attacks you. If no attack was made this way, this card gains surge. (If the Gamora hero or ally is in play, she resolves her ATK against you without exhausting.)
